trans-unit.source: Provides a placeholder for metadata items that cannot be converted from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cshrp](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-cshrp-md.md)] to an underlying data type that persists metadata.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um marcador de posição para itens de metadados que não não possível converter [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cshrp](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-cshrp-md.md)] para um tipo de dados subjacente que persiste metadados.

trans-unit.source: The blob is converted into an array of bytes to preserve the content.
trans-unit.target: O blob é convertido para uma matriz de bytes para preservar o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]suporta os seguintes esquemas de metadados de imagem: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], texto ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] dados Textual), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadataBlob"></xref> and converts the metadata it holds into an array of bytes to persist its content.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadataBlob"> </xref> e converte os metadados realiza para uma matriz de bytes para manter o respetivo conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of bytes that represents the value of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadataBlob"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma matriz de bytes que representa o valor de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadataBlob"> </xref>.
